meta.title: Qubic — Parametric 3D Design for Everyone
meta.description: Turn OpenSCAD models into visual configurators. No CAD training required.

hero.subtitle: Turn OpenSCAD models into visual configurators. No CAD training required.

features.heading: Features
features.manifestDrivenDesc: Define parameters in JSON. UI generates itself.

howItWorks.heading: How It Works
howItWorks.step1Desc: Drop your OpenSCAD source files into Qubic.
howItWorks.step2Desc: Adjust parameters with sliders and toggles — see changes in 3D.
howItWorks.step3Desc: Download STL, 3MF, or OFF. Ready for your slicer.

demo.heading: Live Demo
demo.description: Interact with pre-rendered 3D models. Orbit, zoom, and pan to explore each project.

cta.heading: Ready to build?
cta.subtitle: Upload your OpenSCAD files and get a parametric configurator in minutes.
